thing-type.description:
Smart Energy Switch 3rd Edition

Device Overview

Brief description here

Inclusion and Exclusion

To include the device into the network...

To exclude the device from the network...

parameter.name: config_2_2
parameter.label: 2: Blinking Behaviour
parameter.description:
The LSB defines the total time the device need to blink.
The value if set in seconds. 1 - 255 The MSB defines the on/off interval of the blinking.
The unit is 0.1 s. This is a double byte value.

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Current Overload Protection
parameter.description:
Load will be closed when the Current over runs
(US: 15.5A, other country: 16.2A) for more than 2 minutes.

parameter.name: config_20_1
parameter.label: 20: Output Load Status
parameter.description: Configure the output load status after re‐power on.

parameter.name: config_80_1
parameter.label: 80: Notification on Status Change
parameter.description:
Enable device to send notification to associated devices (Group 1)
when the state of Micro Smart Switch's load changed. DEFAULT is Disable

parameter.name: config_81_1
parameter.label: 81: Configure the state of red LED
parameter.description:
Enable the device to send notification to associated devices (Group 1)
when the state of the Micro Smart Switch's load changed

options.option: The LED will follow the status of its load

parameter.name: config_90_1
parameter.label: 90: Enables/disables parameter 91/92
parameter.description:
Parameter to Enable/Disable automated sending of a Report
triggered by minimal change of value.

parameter.name: config_91_2
parameter.label: 91: Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
parameter.description:
The value represents the minimum change in Wattage
for a Report to be sent. Range is 0 - 32000

parameter.name: config_92_1
parameter.label: 92: Minimum Change to send Report (%)
parameter.description:
The value represents the minimum change in Wattage
Percent for a report to be sent. Range is 0 to 100%

parameter.name: config_100_1
parameter.label: 100: Set 101‐103 to default
parameter.description:
Parameter to Enable/Disable automated sending of a Report
triggered by minimal change of value.

parameter.name: config_101_4
parameter.label: 101: Report type to send to Group 1
parameter.description:
The value is a combination number
made up of the sum of the values for the individual parameters.
The parameters have the values: KWH=8, Wattage=4, Current=2, Voltage=1.
Therefore if you want all parameters sending regular reports, set
the parameter to 15 (8 + 4 + 2 + 1).

parameter.name: config_102_4
parameter.label: 102: Report type to send to Group 2
parameter.description:
The value is a combination number
made up of the sum of the values for the individual parameters.
The parameters have the values: KWH=8, Wattage=4, Current=2, Voltage=1.
Therefore if you want all parameters sending regular reports, set
the parameter to 15 (8 + 4 + 2 + 1).

parameter.name: config_103_4
parameter.label: 103: Report type to send to Group 3
parameter.description:
The value is a combination number
made up of the sum of the values for the individual parameters.
The parameters have the values: KWH=8, Wattage=4, Current=2, Voltage=1.
Therefore if you want all parameters sending regular reports, set
the parameter to 15 (8 + 4 + 2 + 1).

parameter.name: config_111_4
parameter.label: 111: Interval to send out reports to Group 1
parameter.description:
Defines the time interval when the defined report of Reporting Group 1 is sent out.
0 s - 65535 s - Interval

parameter.name: config_112_4
parameter.label: 112: Interval to send out reports of group 2
parameter.description:
Defines the time interval when the defined report of Reporting Group 1 is sent out.
0 s - 65535 s - Interval

parameter.name: config_113_4
parameter.label: 113: Interval to send out reports of group 3
parameter.description:
Defines the time interval when the defined report of Reporting Group 1 is sent out.
0 s - 65535 s - Interval

parameter.name: wakeup_interval
parameter.label: Wakeup Period
parameter.description: Set the wakeup period in seconds

parameter.name: wakeup_node
parameter.label: Wakeup Node
parameter.description: The node to which wakeup messages will be sent
